arts.ttl: Ramos scores winner deep into stoppage time for Ligue 1 leader Paris Saint-Germain against Nice
arts.sum: Substitute Gonçalo Ramos headed home from a corner in the final seconds of stoppage time as Ligue 1 leader Paris Saint-Germain scraped a 1-0 home win against Nice on Saturday. With the last action of the match, Khvicha Kvaratskhelia headed on a right-wing corner and Ramos nodded in from close range to spare PSG a fourth draw in five games.

arts.ttl: PSG vs Nice – Quality of play, Gonçalo Ramos…the highs and lows!
arts.sum: On Saturday evening, Paris Saint-Germain secured a 1-0 victory against Nice in Matchday 11 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season at the Parc des Princes. Here are the highs and lows of this win. Highs – A (nearly) rediscovered PSG. We almost experienced a major disappointment and a potential slide down the standings. This would […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Nice – Luis Enrique doesn’t mince words after the victory
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain defeated Nice 1-0 this Saturday at the Parc des Princes in Matchday 11 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. After the match, PSG coach Luis Enrique spoke to beIN SPORTS. Luis Enrique: “We like playing against a team that sits so far back in our own half.” Was the game plan difficult today? […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Nice – Ramos rejoices: “A very beautiful story.”
arts.sum: Gonçalo Ramos, the 24-year-old Paris Saint-Germain striker, spoke to beIN SPORTS after the 1-0 victory against Nice this Saturday at the Parc des Princes in Matchday 11 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. Ramos: “It’s an excellent victory.” An important victory and goal? Every match is important; it’s difficult to win every match in this […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Nice – Player ratings: control and frustration, until the final victory
arts.sum: This Saturday, during Matchday 11 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season, Paris Saint-Germain faced Nice at the Parc des Princes. arts.ttl: PSG vs Nice Highlights (1–0): Ramos saves Paris in stoppage time
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain left it late but got the job done. In a tense Ligue 1 clash at the Parc des Princes, PSG edged past OGC Nice 1–0 thanks to a last-gasp winner from Gonçalo Ramos. The match, part of the 11th round of the 2025–26 season, showcased Paris’s control and intensity – but also their […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Nice – Live pre-match coverage of the Parisians
arts.sum: This Saturday, as part of Matchday 11 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Nice (8th) at the Parc des Princes. While kickoff is at 5:00 PM CET, the club invites you to follow the pre-match preparations, including the players’ warm-up, starting at 4:00 PM. Watch the live stream here:

arts.ttl: PSG vs Nice – The referee for the Matchday 11 fixture has been appointed, and here are his statistics.
arts.sum: This Saturday, as part of Matchday 11 of the 2025–2026 Ligue 1 season, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will host Nice (8th) at the Parc des Princes (kickoff at 5 p.m., CET).
